PSL____point_tokens

PURPOSE

[points] =point_features(points_kept,imsize)

SYNOPSIS

function [points] =point_features(points_kept,imsize);

DESCRIPTION 

 [points] =point_features(points_kept,imsize)

 Converts point structure returned by PS1___scale_space_sketch
 into point structure amenable to subsequent processing, display, etc.

 Iasonas Kokkinos <jkokkin@stat.ucla.edu>
 10/10/2007

0011 [c_m,c_n]=  ind2sub(imsize,points_kept.indexes);
0012 reject =find(points_kept.det_hess<0);
0013 curv = points_kept.tr_hess./max(points_kept.det_hess,.000000001);
0014 
0015 points.c_m = c_m';
0016 points.c_n = c_n';
0017 points.ratios = ones(size(points.c_m));
0018 points.scales = points_kept.scl';
0019 points.orientations = points_kept.theta';
0020 points.ener = points_kept.ener';

0022 %% will be used later to reject these points
0023 %% (cuvr>0 is an acceptance condition)
0024 points.curv(reject) = -1;
